get.description: Lists Agent versions and their update severity.

node_name.description: Node name where the agent runs.

severity.description:
- UPDATE_SEVERITY_UNSUPPORTED: The client version is newer than the server version.
 - UPDATE_SEVERITY_UP_TO_DATE: The client version matches the server version.
 - UPDATE_SEVERITY_REQUIRED: The client's minor or patch version is older.
 - UPDATE_SEVERITY_CRITICAL: The client's major version is older.

status.description:
Service status.

 - STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: In case we don't support the db vendor yet.
 - STATUS_UP: The service is up.
 - STATUS_DOWN: The service is down.
 - STATUS_UNKNOWN: The service's status cannot be known (e.g. there are no metrics yet).

post.description: Adds a service and starts several agents.

node_id.description:
Node identifier on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

node_name.description:
Node name on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

add_node.description: AddNodeParams holds node params and is used to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

container_id.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

address.description:
Node and Service access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

port.description:
Service Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

socket.description:
Service Access socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

pmm_agent_id.description: The "pmm-agent" identifier which should run agents. Required.

username.description: MySQL username for scraping metrics.

qan_mysql_perfschema.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-perfschema-agent for provided service.

qan_mysql_slowlog.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-slowlog-agent for provided service.

disable_comments_parsing.description: Disable parsing comments from queries and showing them in QAN.

max_query_length.description: Limit query length in QAN (default: server-defined; -1: no limit).

max_slowlog_file_size.description:
If qan-mysql-slowlog-agent is added, slowlog file is rotated at this size if > 0.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable rotation.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

tablestats_group_table_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors will be disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable them.

metrics_mode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

 - METRICS_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: Auto

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tablestats_group_disabled.description: True if tablestats group collectors are currently disabled.

expose_exporter.title: Optionally expose the exporter process on all public interfaces

metrics_resolutions.description: MetricsResolutions represents Prometheus exporters metrics resolutions.

hr.description: High resolution. In JSON should be represented as a string with number of seconds with `s` suffix.

mr.description: Medium resolution. In JSON should be represented as a string with number of seconds with `s` suffix.

lr.description: Low resolution. In JSON should be represented as a string with number of seconds with `s` suffix.

lr.description: Low resolution. In JSON should be represented as a string with number of seconds with `s` suffix.

qan_mongodb_profiler.description: QANMongoDBProfilerAgent runs within pmm-agent and sends MongoDB Query Analytics data to the PMM Server.

pmm_agent_id.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

username.description: MongoDB username for getting profiler data.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

max_query_length.description: Limit query length in QAN (default: server-defined; -1: no limit).

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

max_query_length.description: Limit query length in QAN (default: server-defined; -1: no limit).

Access address (DNS name or IP).

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

tablestats_group_table_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors are disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
0 means tablestats group collectors are always enabled (no limit).
Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

push_metrics_enabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

table_count.description: Actual table count at the moment of adding.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tablestats_group_disabled.description: True if tablestats group collectors are currently disabled.

node_model.description:
Represents a purchasable Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) under a product.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/partner-center/develop/product-resources#sku.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name. Defaults to Azure Database instance ID.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Defaults to Azure Database instance ID.

username.description: Username for scraping metrics.

qan.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-perfschema-agent or qan-postgresql-pgstatements-agent.

custom_labels.description: Custom user-assigned labels for Node and Service.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

tablestats_group_table_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors will be disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable them.

type.description:
DiscoverAzureDatabaseType describes supported Azure Database instance engines.

 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_MYSQL: MySQL type: microsoft.dbformysql or MariaDB type: microsoft.dbformariadb
 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_POSTGRESQL: PostgreSQL type: microsoft.dbformysql

delete.description: Removes a Service along with its Agents.

parameters.description: Either a Service ID or a Service Name.
parameters.name: service_id

post.description: Discovers Azure Database for MySQL, MariaDB and PostgreSQL Server instances.

items.description: DiscoverAzureDatabaseInstance models an unique Azure Database instance for the list of instances returned by Discovery.

service_name.description: Azure database server name.

username.description: Database username.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

type.description:
DiscoverAzureDatabaseType describes supported Azure Database instance engines.

 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_MYSQL: MySQL type: microsoft.dbformysql or MariaDB type: microsoft.dbformariadb
 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_POSTGRESQL: PostgreSQL type: microsoft.dbformysql

node_model.description:
Represents a purchasable Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) under a product.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/partner-center/develop/product-resources#sku.

items.description: DiscoverRDSInstance models an unique RDS instance for the list of instances returned by Discovery.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

engine.description: DiscoverRDSEngine describes supported RDS instance engines.
